fixes.description: Establish a secure method for managing sensitive credentials using environment variables or a secrets management tool. This will prevent accidental exposure in logs and subprocesses, ensuring compliance with security standards.

stakeholder_impacts.Security Team: High impact due to improved security and compliance.
stakeholder_impacts.DevOps Team: Medium impact as it streamlines deployment processes.
stakeholder_impacts.Development Team: Medium impact by reducing the risk of credential exposure in code.
stakeholder_impacts.Product Team: Low impact as this is primarily a backend concern.
stakeholder_impacts.Business Stakeholders: Low impact but may reduce potential costs related to security breaches.

fixes.description: Refactor the error handling and logging mechanisms in the CDC process to ensure robust tracking of errors, including meaningful messages and context. This will facilitate troubleshooting and improve system reliability.

stakeholder_impacts.Security Team: Medium impact as it aids in identifying security breaches.
stakeholder_impacts.DevOps Team: High impact due to improved monitoring and operational stability.
stakeholder_impacts.Development Team: Medium impact by enhancing code maintainability.
stakeholder_impacts.Product Team: Low impact as this is primarily a backend concern.
stakeholder_impacts.Business Stakeholders: Medium impact by potentially reducing downtime and associated costs.

fixes.fix_title: Conduct Load Testing and Performance Profiling
fixes.description: Perform load testing and performance profiling to assess the impact of high data volumes on real-time CDC operations. This will ensure scalability and responsiveness under peak loads.

stakeholder_impacts.Security Team: Medium impact as performance issues can lead to vulnerabilities.
stakeholder_impacts.DevOps Team: High impact by identifying potential bottlenecks.
stakeholder_impacts.Development Team: Medium impact by informing code optimizations.
stakeholder_impacts.Product Team: High impact as it directly affects user experience.
stakeholder_impacts.Business Stakeholders: Medium impact by ensuring system reliability and user satisfaction.

fixes.description: Develop thorough documentation that includes installation instructions, usage examples, and guidelines for contributing to the codebase. This will facilitate onboarding for new developers and improve overall project maintainability.

stakeholder_impacts.Security Team: Low impact but can help in educating developers about security best practices.
stakeholder_impacts.DevOps Team: High impact by streamlining deployment processes.
stakeholder_impacts.Development Team: High impact by improving code maintainability.
stakeholder_impacts.Product Team: Medium impact by enhancing developer experience.
stakeholder_impacts.Business Stakeholders: Medium impact by reducing onboarding time and associated costs.

fixes.fix_title: Implement Monitoring and Alerting for CDC Operations
fixes.description: Integrate comprehensive monitoring tools and set up alerting mechanisms to track data flows and detect failures in data synchronization between DynamoDB and Snowflake.

stakeholder_impacts.Security Team: High impact by enabling quick detection of security breaches.
stakeholder_impacts.DevOps Team: High impact by improving operational oversight.
stakeholder_impacts.Development Team: Medium impact by providing insights for code improvements.
stakeholder_impacts.Product Team: Medium impact as it enhances overall system reliability.
stakeholder_impacts.Business Stakeholders: Medium impact by reducing potential downtime costs.

fixes.description: Review and optimize the input sanitization process to ensure it only targets necessary inputs, thereby enhancing overall system performance without compromising security.

stakeholder_impacts.Security Team: Medium impact by ensuring security without unnecessary overhead.
stakeholder_impacts.DevOps Team: Medium impact as it can improve system performance.
stakeholder_impacts.Development Team: High impact by reducing complexity in the codebase.
stakeholder_impacts.Product Team: Medium impact as it enhances user experience under load.
stakeholder_impacts.Business Stakeholders: Medium impact by potentially reducing operational costs.
